page.title: 17 HOSPITAL FACILITIES
page.content: Wards and Beds-There are 15 wards and 286 beds.There are 2 Medical wards with 40 beds,1 Rheumatology with 19 beds,1 Chest with 16 beds,3 Surgical with 44 beds,2 Orthapaedic with 36 beds,1 Gynaecology with 17 beds,2 Obstetric with 30 beds and 3 Geriatric with 70 beds.There are also 6 Ear,Nose and Throat beds,2 Opthalmic beds and 4 Dental beds. The hospital offers facilities for the treatment of many medical complaints. It has a Pharmacy,X-Ray unit,Maternity area,Physiotherapy area and a complex Assisted Ventilation unit. The buildings on Exning Road that now house the present hospital were once used as the Newmarket Union Workhouse. Other additions,however,have also been made,such as 6 wards built in the 2nd World War to treat injured soldiers and airmen.
